recipe_name: Mango passion with honey and yoghurt
recipe_instructions: Mix together the honey and yoghurt in a small bowl. Using a teaspoon, scoop the seeds and flesh from the passion fruit into a bowl and mix with yoghurt mixture. Divide the mango and yoghurt mixture in half and place into two stemmed glasses. Chill for up to 8 hours. Serve at room temperature and garnish with fresh mint.
